entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Sudbury Airport 5:00 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 1.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 76 %
Dewpoint: -2.0°C
Wind: SSW 28 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or drizzle early this evening. A few flurries beginning early this evening and ending before morning. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming north 20 after midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Clearing. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early in the morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and after midnight. Light snow beginning overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
